text: Sylvia Chang (born 21 July 1953) is a Taiwanese movie director, actress, singer and producer. She began her career in the 1970s. She has acted in, directed and produced many movies. Chang won the Hong Kong Film Award for Best Actress. Her movies have been accepted into movie festivals. She was born in Chiayi City, Taiwan. ==References== Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese movie directors Category:Chinese movie producers Category:1953 births Category:Living people
title: Sylvia Chang
